name: Didn't Ask
description:
Didn't Ask is a Topdown TwinShooter Nobody Asked For. Made solely for the 2022 Falmouth University Mind The Gap Game Jam.

Be mindful of the gaps. Shoot your way out of trouble. Destroy the Cubes. Face your consequences.  

DO NOT PRESS THE BUTTON!

DO NOT CROSS THE LINE!

DO NOT GET HIT!

Controls:

W,A,S,D = To Navigate The World

Arrow Keys/ ↑ ↓ → ← = To Shoot Your Projectile. 

Space = Dash Forward 



A Game made by Ben Farrell & Calve Cowdry
